page.title: 10SUPERNATURAL
page.content: One story concerns the ghost of an Irish navvy who is said to haunt the site of the new library, which is where he was buried following his death during the building of the railway. People were worried in case the building of the new library disturbed him and he came to haunt them. Formakin House was the location of the following: a newly married couple ran out of petrol one night near the House. The husband walked back to Bishopton and while he was away an old woman appeared, said, "He'll no be back," and disappeared. But he did come back, but minus his head which he was carrying under his arm _ well, that's what our informer said.....
